testsuite.name: com.puce.NakanoStay.controllers.HotelControllerTest

testcase.name: should return 500 when unexpected error occurs()
should create hotel with null city and stars when post()
should delete hotel when delete by id()
should return hotel with null values when get by id()
should return empty list when no hotels exist()
should return 400 when update hotel with validation error()
should return 409 when create hotel with conflict error()
should return 404 when delete non-existent hotel()
should return 404 when get hotel by non-existent id()
should return 400 when create hotel with validation error()
should return all hotels when get all()
should return hotel when get by id()
should return 404 when update non-existent hotel()
should return 409 when update hotel with conflict error()
